dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6811 IH: Natural Climate Solutions Research and Extension Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself and Ms. Houlahan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to provide for high-priority research and extension grants for natural climate solutions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Natural Climate Solutions Research and Extension Act of 2023.

section.header: High-priority research and extension grants for natural climate solutions
section.text: Section 1672(d) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925(d)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Research and extension grants may be made under this section for the purpose of advancing land management practices that store carbon or reduce greenhouse gas emissions in agricultural lands and soils, grasslands, wetlands, and forests, including practices thatâ€”

subparagraph.text: are based on traditional ecological knowledge;
promote biodiversity and climate change resilience; and
